name: Don't Touch the Cube!
description:
Don't Touch the Cube is a Action puzzle game made for the ZenoJam 3 GameJam. With the Theme "It Never Ends" being the Main focus, this game will never end unless you find out how to Win.

Oh, and don't touch the Cube.

Controls:

  • Use WASD or the Directional Keys to Move
  • Hold SHIFT to run (Ideal, since the Cube is faster than the walk speed)
  • Press SPACE to Jump
  • Look around with the Mouse

Credits

Main Menu: "Awakening" from Purple Planet

Gameplay: "Code Red" from Purple Planet

Box Sound: "Vibraphone 2" from  Zapsplat

Player: "Xbot" from Mixamo
